query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Già eran li occhi miei rifissi al volto 2 de la mia donna, e l’animo con essi, 3 e da ogne altro intento s’era tolto.
query.error: **English:** 1 My eyes were already fixed again on the face 2 of my lady, and my soul with them, 3 and from every other thought it had withdrawn itself.
query.result: 1 Giyāstām mama netrāni punaḥ sthāpitāni āsām 2 Mama svāminyāḥ mukhe, ātmā ca taiḥ saha, 3 Sarvāṇy anyāni ca kāryāṇi parityaktāni āsīt.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 4 Sā ca na hasati sma; kim tu "yadi aham hasye," 5 mayā ārabdham, "tvam bhaviṣyasi yathā 6 Semelē yadā bhasmasāt kṛtā:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 se non si temperasse, tanto splende, 11 che ’l tuo mortal podere, al suo fulgore, 12 sarebbe fronda che trono scoscende.
query.error: **English:** 10 if it were not tempered, shines so brightly 11 that your mortal power, in its radiance, 12 would be like a branch that a thunderbolt breaks off.
query.result: 10 yadi na samyamyeta, tāvad bhāsate, 11 yathā tava martyaśaktiḥ, tasya prakāśe, 12 śākhā bhaviṣyati yām vajraḥ patayati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Noi sem levati al settimo splendore, 14 che sotto ’l petto del Leone ardente 15 raggia mo misto giù del suo valore.
query.error: **English:** 13 We rose to the seventh splendor, 14 which, beneath the breast of the burning Lion, 15 now gleams mingled with its own power.
query.result: 13 Vayam udyatāḥ saptamam tejas, 14 yat simhasya dahanasya urasasya adhastāt, 15 idānīm prakāśate miśram sva-śaktyā saha.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 16 Pṛṣṭhataḥsvasyaśarīrasyanetrāṇipratiṣṭhāpaya, 17 tathācapratibimbayoḥsvarūpaṃkuruta, 18 yadetatpratibimbaṃtvayipratibhāsitamasti.

query.prompt:
